data.name: Beyond The Darkness
data.detailed_description:
Have you been able to overcome your fears?


Beyond The Darkness is an adventure horror tale.
Little Millie will conquer fear after fear to find her parents.

In this game, you have to help the little girl Millie overcome her nightmares and find her parents in the world of her most vivid memories, which she got into by a strange coincidence.

Each level is a memory clouded by fear, which Millie defeats with the help of a magic lamp and light.

Game Features :

- Each location is a separate world.
- Levels are kept in suspense.
- Tough moral choices.
- Scary story.


The gameplay is based on the effect of obsession, which accumulates if the girl is without a magical light that protects her for a long time. One cannot live without light in this world, because as soon as the lamp goes out, the world around becomes dark, and this is the most harmless description.

data.short_description: Have you been able to overcome your fears? Horror fairy tale with light mechanics.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian*, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit.
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3.
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit.
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
